body.name: HyperX Pulsefire Haste – Gaming Mouse, Ultra-Lightweight, 59g, Honeycomb Shell, Hex Design, RGB, HyperFlex USB Cable, Up to 16000 DPI, 6 Programmable Buttons,Black

features: Ultra-light hex shell design: The honeycomb shell provides feather-light weight without sacrificing durability.
HyperFlex USB Cable: The light, flexible paracord material reduces tension and resistance for easier mouse movement.
TTC Golden micro dustproof switches: These switches provide solid, satisfying clicks and are rated for 60 million clicks.
Pure virgin-grade PTFE skates: The low-friction 100% PTFE skates help provide an easy, effortless glide.
Grip tape included: For more control and comfort, grip tape for the sides and left and right buttons are included.
Customizable with HyperX NGENUITY Software: Easily customize DPI settings, RGB lighting, button assignments, and record macros with powerful, easy-to-use, HyperX NGENUITY Software.
body.description: The HyperX Pulsefire Haste is built for elite gamers looking to gain every fraction of a second possible in their quest to be the best. Weighing in at 59 grams, this full-featured, responsive honeycomb shell mouse has everything you need, just without the extra weight. TTC Golden micro switches provide satisfying, reliable clicks and are rated for 60 million clicks, so you won’t have to worry about missing inputs. The flexible HyperFlex USB cable and the virgin-grade PTFE skates work together to give you a smooth, easy glide to make dominating the game simple.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ultra-light hex shell design Built with a honeycomb shell that makes the mouse lighter than a solid shell mouse, without sacrificing durability. HyperFlex USB Cable The HyperFlex USB Cable is made from light, flexible paracord material designed to reduce tension and resistance for easier mouse movement. TTC Golden micro switches These switches feature an anti-dust coating, and are rated for up to 60 million clicks. Sensor The solid sensor provides precise tracking without hardware acceleration and supports native DPI settings up to 16000.

Pure virgin-grade PTFE skates The low-friction 100% PTFE skates help provide an easy, effortless glide to make the mouse more responsive. Replacement set of skates included. Grip tape included For people who prefer a bit more control and comfort, grip tape is included for the side of the mouse and both left and right mouse buttons. Customize with HyperX Ngenuity Easily customize DPI settings, RGB lighting, button assignments, and record macros with powerful, easy-to-use, HyperX NGENUITY Software. Customizable RGB lighting Add a personalized touch of RGB style to your setup.

Is the mouse compatible with consoles? Yes, the mouse is compatible with consoles, but the game must support mouse and keyboard. Please check with the system manufacturer for a full list of compatible titles, or the game's support page if you have a specific title in mind. Is it compatible with Mac? Yes. Please keep in mind that we have designed the product to be compatible with PC, PS4, PS5, Xbox One, and Xbox Series X|S. Your experience may vary. Can you assign macros to the mouse buttons? Yes, you can use Ngenuity to assign them to the different buttons. Select your mouse, click on the button to reassign, select Macro, then customize and assign the macro. I want to reposition the grip tapes. Will it stick onto the mouse? The grip tapes are recommended for a single application. You can run into trouble reapplying them on the mouse or other products. What is the polling rate? 1000 Hz (1 ms).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than the Razer Viper.
reviews.reviewText: So I bought the Razer Viper when it was first released. I loved the Viper and still do. A bit of a back story, I prefer lightweight mice because I tend to get RSI episodes after prolonged use of mice (at work/games). The Razer adder is by far the most comfortable mouse I’ve used, but its hefty weight almost caused me to quit gaming. Tried a vertical mouse and a whole bunch of ergo mice but to no avail. My RSI symptoms persisted. Once the Razer viper was released I bought as a last ditch effort ... and to my surprise it worked. I was able to game without any RSI symptoms. Two years later I was In search for a lighter mouse and I tried the Glorious D.... and while it was more comfortable to hold (bigger) and it was lighter, the glorious felt cheap and its buttons were too mushy for my liking. A few months later I try the Haste. And by far this mouse is superior to both the Viper and Glorious. Quality of build is excellent. The mouse is rigid and less heavy than the viper (very noticeable). But what sold me on this mouse was the quality of the left/right click buttons. They are crisp and responsive without being too sensitive. The cord is way more flexible than that of the Viper’s. Only con is that the scroll wheel (front/back) are not programmable. Also, the mouse much like the Viper is on the small side. Unless you are use to mice this size or have small hands, it will take some to to get use to mice this size. However, most lightweight mice under 60 grams will be about the same size (with a few exceptions).With that said, wish they added a few more buttons and made a larger mouse without compromising the weight too much.Would buy again. This my is by far the best mouse for the buck and is better than most higher priced mice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality Mouse
reviews.reviewText: So I’ve had quite a few different “gaming” mice in my time. I’ve had a few Corsair, and even a few different versions of Finalmouse. But I decided to take a chance on this HyperX mouse now that my previous favorite “Finalmouse”, has gotten way too expensive for me to justify the purchase.It’s been I think 10 months or so since I bought the mouse, and it still functions exactly as the day I bought it. One thing I had a problem with other brands was the middle mouse button breaking on me after about 6 months of use, but this one feels solid and is still in working order.I’m also a huge fan of the lightweight honey comb feature, which also helps prevent your hand from sweating during extended gaming sessions. The program used to customize the lighting and set the DPI is very easy to use. I also like that it has different color codings for each DPI cycle. The size is also just right, I have medium-large hands, and it fits nice and comfortably in my hand.This is definitely a must-have mouse, and if it ever fails me, I will 100% buy another.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can't be beat at this price point.
reviews.reviewText: There's no mouse to rival the Haste at this price point. While many would consider this a budget mouse, it doesn't perform like one or feel like one. TTC switches are loud and clicky (very satisfying sound), scroll wheel is silent, there's no rattling when shaken, no creaking when gripped firmly, and the stock cable was surprisingly good. Not XM1r good, but close. You also get an extra set of skates, which glide very well and aren't thin like some other stock skates. Set of grips come in the box, too. Very nice looking and provide all the grip you want. Thumbs up for that.Don't be discouraged by the 3335 sensor. It performs good and we're at a point that sensors don't matter as much as comfort. My hand size is 18cm x 9.5cm and the Haste fits my hand well with a relaxed palm/fingertip grip. If you claw grip, I'd maybe look at something else. Side buttons could have been a bit bigger, protruded a bit more, and I don't like that HyperX chose to use a glossy plastic instead of the great feeling matte plastic the shell has (I'm nitpicking at this point, trying hard to find something not to like about this mouse).Is it the best mouse? No, but if you're ceiling is $50-60, get this mouse... period. There's nothing at this price point that is better. It's light (59g, 61g on my scale), performs well, comes with extras, and has unexpectedly good build quality for a mouse at this price point. The only other mouse that gives you this much value to price ratio would be the Viper Mini.

It is so light that you can barely feel it and the cable feels non-existent. The recoil on the Mouse Buttons 1 and 2 are the best, easy 15-16 Cps for people who normally get 13-14. Drag clicking is a revolutionary feeling on this mouse, it becomes super easy and almost no effort. The Mouse also glides across any surface (not rough surfaces though). Really is the best gaming mouse out there, really worth the price.

Para responder o título logo: SIM! Vale bastante a pena. Eu estou usando o mouse há 2 dias e estou simplesmente amando. Testei em jogos rápidos como League of Legends, Valorant e Overwatch, como em jogos mais tranquilos como World of Warcraft. Simplesmente 10/10 em todo quesito. Vou abordar uns tópicos para ficar mais fácil a review. PESO: - O mouse é realmente MUITO leve, eu até achei que teria problemas por ser leve demais, no entanto, ele é um equilíbrio perfeito. É leve o suficiente para você ter capacidade de fazer movimentos rápidos com o mínimo de esforço, ao mesmo tempo que não será tão leve ao ponto de você sentir que não está pegando em nada.PEGADA: - O mouse tem uma pegada ÓTIMA, minha mão é medio-grande (tenho 1,80.. acho que da para ter uma média com minha altura, não sei), então um mouse um pouco maior é perfeito para mim. O mouse NÃO escorrega em nenhum momento, mesmo com a minha mão suando a todo momento! (não utilizei os adesivos que vem junto ao mouse)CLICK: - O clique do mouse é bastante suave, meus tendões agradecem e MUITO. Não possuo tendinite diagnosticada, mas sinto dores no meu pulso após um certo tempo jogando. Decidi comprar esse mouse mais leve para tentar evitar sentir dores, e foi a escolha certa! Para finalizar, o mouse em si é ótimo. Cabo LONGO, super resistente e de uma qualidade absurda. Eu pessoalmente tinha ficado meio desanimado após ver que o produto possuía led apenas no Scroll (bolinha). Mas, depois percebi que não era necessário leds em outros lugares, já que a minha (nossa) mão cobre a maior parte do mouse. O mouse promete somente o essencial, e entrega somente o essencial com EXCELÊNCIA. Não adicionaria, nem removeria absolutamente nada no mouse. Comprem, este mouse é simplesmente perfeito para tudo, e todos... mesmo que você tenha tendinite e/ou hiperidrose palmar... esse mouse é feito para VOCÊ!
My son can do the drag click on it, he is happy
super souris très légère précise pour le gaming et glissante

Fino ad oggi ho utilizzato mouse da gaming di un altro brand ma da quando sto utilizzando questo prodotto sono rimasto assolutamente meravigliato dalla sua leggerezza della sua precisione e della semplicità del suo software. Ho scelto quello con il filo che non da alcun problema nei movimenti in quanto è fatto con materiale che non non crea effetto contrasto. Assolutamente consigliato.
